profile.title: User Center
profile.closeText: Click anywhere outside to close the personal center

titleline.one: Are you struggling to have your project's value recognized by others?
titleline.two: Do you want to find developers and user communities to quickly build project influence?
titleline.three: Join EachStar Open Source Collaboration Platform to help you and your open source project grow together!

tagline.one: Quickly build influence and enhance value in the early stages of your project
tagline.two: Find like-minded open source partners to grow together
tagline.three: Explore new open source ideas and ignite inspiration in your early projects

intro.title: Do you participate in or own an open source project?

register.title: Register on EachStar
register.line1: Click on the top right corner to register an account
register.line2: or log in with an existing account

like.title: Like / Publish Projects
like.line1: Accumulate stars by liking others' projects
like.line2: on the card page / personal center
like.line3: Use free stars to publish your own projects

learn.title: Continuous Learning and Improvement
learn.line1: Join QQ group for more discussions

about.title: About EachStar
about.description: EachStar is an open source community platform that helps developers and open source project owners quickly build influence and enhance value in the early stages of their projects. EachStar provides a platform for developers to find like-minded open source partners to grow together, explore new open source ideas, and ignite inspiration in their early projects.

card.title: EachStar Card Collection
card.description: Card is a page where you can view and like other people's projects. You can also publish your own projects here.
